abilities.name: {A} Saber Strike
abilities.text: Perform a {P} attack using 1 red and 1 yellow die. This attack gains Pierce 3.

abilities.name: Inspiring
abilities.text: While another friendly figure within 3 spaces is attacking, it may reroll 1 die.

abilities.name: Aim
abilities.text: If you have not exited your space during this activation, apply +1 {H} and +2 Accuracy to your attack results.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.text: You can trigger the same {B} ability up to twice per attack.

abilities.name: {A} Slam
abilities.text: Choose 1 adjacent hostile figure and roll 1 red die. That figure suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. Then, if it is a small figure, you may push it 1 space.

abilities.name: Protector
abilities.text: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 {G} to the defense results. Limit 1 "Protector"ability used per attack.

abilities.name: Return Fire
abilities.text: After an attack targeting you is resolved, if you did not suffer any {H}, you can interrupt to perform an attack targeting that attacker. Limit once per round.

abilities.name: Distracting
abilities.text: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 {F} to the defense results.

abilities.name: Cunning
abilities.text: While defending, apply +1 {G} to the defense results for each {F} result.

abilities.name: {A} Inform
abilities.text: Choose an adjacent friendly figure. That figure becomes Focused.

abilities.name: Cower
abilities.text: While defending, while adjacent to a friendly figure, you may reroll 1 defense die.

abilities.name: Distracting
abilities.text: While a friendly figure is defending, and you are adjacent to the targeted space, apply +1 {F} to the defense results.

abilities.name: Non-Combatant
abilities.text: You cannot attack.

abilities.name: {A} Service:
abilities.text: You or an adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE recovers 1 {H}.

abilities.name: Computer Interface Arm
abilities.text: You can perform {I} tests on objects on which heroes can perform {I} tests(elite figures receive 1 success).

abilities.name: Lucky
abilities.text: While defending, if you roll a blank result, add +1 {E} to the defense results.

abilities.name: {A} Battlefield Leadership
abilities.text: Perform an attack, then choose another friendly figure within 3 spaces. That figure may interrupt to perform an attack with the same target.

abilities.name: {B} Aggressive Negotiations
abilities.text: Place 1 strain token on any enemy deployment group. The next time this group activates, discard the token and ignore its Bonus Effect.

abilities.name: Front Line
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target is within 3 spaces of you, you may replace 1 blue die in your attack pool with 1 red die.

abilities.name: Efficient Travel
abilities.text: You ignore additional movement point costs for difficult terrain and hostile figures.

abilities.name: Resourceful
abilities.text: While attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your attack or defense dice.

abilities.name: Gambit
abilities.text: Before you reroll a die, you may replace it with another die of the same type. After rolling, the new die is considered rerolled.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.text: After a {O} attack targeting you or an adjacent friendly figure resolves, a hostile figure of your choice in your line of site suffers 1 {H}.

abilities.name: Heroic
abilities.text: Once during your activation, you may perform an attack without spending an action.

abilities.name: Guerilla
abilities.text: After you resolve an attack, if the defender was defeated, become Hidden.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target space is 5 or more spaces away, you may reroll 1 attack die.

abilities.name: {A} Force Leap
abilities.text: Place your figure in an empty space within 6 spaces.

abilities.name: Vigor
abilities.text: At the start of your activation, you may gain 2 movement points or 1 POWER-{F}.

abilities.name: Twin Sabers
abilities.text: While attacking, you may reroll all attack dice or force the defender to reroll all defense dice.

abilities.name: Brash
abilities.text: At the start of each round, move up to 4 spaces.

abilities.name: Stronger Together
abilities.text: While attacking, choose a hero within 3 spaces. For each non-red die in ist {J} pool, you may reroll 1 attack die.

abilities.name: Force Vision
abilities.text: After this activation, instead of having the app decide the next Imperial activation randomly, select an enemy group and manually activate it. This counts as the next Imperial activation.

abilities.name: Soresu Defense
abilities.text: While a friendly figure within 3 spaces is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die. If it does, convert each {E} result to 2 {G} and 1 {F} and, if that figure does not have a {P} weapon or attack type, you suffer 1 {H}.

abilities.name: {A} Evasive Maneuver
abilities.text: Move up to 2 spaces, then recover 2 {H}.

abilities.name: Parting Gift
abilities.text: Once during your activation, you may choose a space within 2 spaces and roll 1 green die. Each other figure and object on or adjacent to that space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

abilities.name: Bo-Rifle Staff Strike
abilities.text: Once during your activation, you may perform a {P} attack using 2 red dice without spending an action.

abilities.name: Use the Force
abilities.text: While another friendly figure within 3 spaces is performing an attribute test, apply +1 {B} to the results.

abilities.name: Mind Trick
abilities.text: Once during your activation, you may choose up to 2 hostile figures within 4 spaces of you. Push each of those figures 1 space.

abilities.name: Call the Shots
abilities.text: While another friendly figure within 3 spaces is attacking, you may apply +2 Accuracy, +1 {H}, or +1 {B} to the attack results. Limit once per round.

abilities.name: Smooth Landing
abilities.text: After deployment, you and each adjacent friendly figure gains 1 movement point.

abilities.name: {A} Ram
abilities.text: Move up to 2 spaces, then choose an adjacent figure. If that figure is hostile, roll 1 green die. It suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. Then, if that figure is small, push it up to 1 space.

abilities.name: {B} System Shock
abilities.text: Use while on or adjacent to a terminal. Choose a figure on or adjacent to any terminal. That figure suffers 2 {H} and 1 {C}.

abilities.name: {A} Smuggler's Instincts
abilities.text: Perform an interact, then move up to 2 spaces.

abilities.name: Slippery
abilities.text: While defending, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results. After an attack targeting you resolves, gain 2 movement points.

abilities.name: {A} Improved Smuggler's Instincts
abilities.text: Perform an interact, then move up to 3 spaces.

abilities.name: Slippery
abilities.text: While defending, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results. After an attack targeting you resolves, gain 2 movement points.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.text: While attacking, if you have suffered 5 or more {H}, apply +1 {B} to the attack results.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.text: While attacking, if you have suffered 5 or more {H}, apply +1 {B} to the attack results.

abilities.name: Guerilla
abilities.text: After you resolve an attack, if the defender was defeated, become Hidden.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target space is 5 or more spaces away, you may reroll 1 attack die.

abilities.name: Guerilla
abilities.text: After you resolve an attack, if the defender was defeated, become Hidden.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target space is 5 or more spaces away, you may reroll 1 attack die.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.text: You can trigger the same {B} ability up to twice per attack.

abilities.name: Priority Target
abilities.text: Figures do not block line of sight for this figure's attacks.

abilities.name: Aim
abilities.text: If you have not exited your space during this activation, apply +1 {H} and +2 Accuracy to your attack results.

abilities.name: {A} {A} Get Into Position
abilities.text: Gain 4 movement points and become Focused.
